Uses of Interface
btrplace.plan.ReconfigurationPlan

  • Packages that use ReconfigurationPlan 
    Package Description
    btrplace.json.plan
    Converters for a plan and its sub-components.
    btrplace.model.constraint
    Concrete implementation of SatConstraint.
    btrplace.plan
    Basic API to specify a ReconfigurationPlan.
    btrplace.solver
    API to define a ReconfigurationAlgorithm.
    btrplace.solver.choco
    Choco implementation of a ReconfigurationAlgorithm.
    btrplace.solver.choco.runner
    A package dedicated to the different solving methods.
    btrplace.solver.choco.transition
    Different classes to model the possible state transitions for a VM or a node.
    btrplace.solver.choco.view
    Choco implementation of the model views.
